programme.title: Portillos Andalucia

programme.title: Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys

programme.title: Prisoner: Cell Block H
programme.desc: Joan carries out a devious act of revenge on the Conquerors, as she burns their bikes. Bob tries desperately to enforce new rules, in an attempt to reduce the trouble within the prison.

programme.title: Prisoner: Cell Block H

programme.title: Wildlife on One
programme.sub-title: African Penguin: Cool Bird in a Hot Spot
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates a programme which follows several thousand pioneering young penguins as they invade Boulders Beach, a busy resort in Cape Town, in an attempt to establish a new colony amid the sun loungers.

programme.title: Jane Goodall: Beauty and the Beasts
programme.desc: Documentary about Jane Goodall, a young secretary from Bournemouth with no scientific qualifications, who entered a remote forest in Africa in 1960 and became accepted by a group of wild chimpanzees. Her discoveries transformed our understanding of them and challenged the way we define ourselves as human beings by showing just how close we are as a species to our closest living relatives.

programme.title: Wogan
programme.desc: Terry Wogan talks to primatologist Jane Goodall and actor Adrian Edmondson, with music by Eurythmics. Plus, theres a satellite interview with Parker from `Thunderbirds.

programme.title: A Choral Pilgrimage with The Sixteen
programme.desc: Luminous choral music on the theme of peace, performed by one of the worlds finest choirs and recorded at Peterborough Cathedral. A hymn to tranquillity, the concert features music from across nine centuries, from the medieval abbess Hildegard of Bingen to Anna Clyne with a new work for choir and violin. There are also sumptuous works by John Taverner, Will Todd and Arvo Part in his 90th birthday year. The Sixteen is led by conductor Harry Christophers. Presented by Hannah French.

programme.title: Lord Mervyn King Remembers... The Age of Uncertainty
programme.desc: Former governor of the Bank of England Mervyn King looks back on the BBCs 1977 series on the history of economic thinking, The Age of Uncertainty. Written and presented by the highly influential economist and intellectual JK Galbraith, the series tackled the challenge of bringing economics to a mainstream audience head on, seemingly sparing no expense in its use of actors, elaborate sets and multiple international locations.

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.sub-title: The Prophets and Promise of Classical Capitalism
programme.desc: John Kenneth Galbraith tells the story of the men who laid the foundations of economics, including Adam Smith, David Ricardo and Thomas Malthus. What they made of the world of their time profoundly affects our world.

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.sub-title: The Manners and Morals of High Capitalism
programme.desc: Professor Galbraith looks at the ideas that sustained the rich in the 19th century and how they still affect our attitudes today. Herbert Spencer justified the money-making in straight Darwinian terms as survival of the fittest. Thorstein Veblen thought a parallel with the Papuan savages a more appropriate one.

programme.title: Imagine...
programme.desc: Romantic, fearless, fantastical: delve into the thrilling world of Philip Pullman, and explore the authors own dark materials. Philip has been named both one of Britains greatest writers and the most dangerous writer in Britain. He is best known for the much-loved `His Dark Materials trilogy, which follows a young heroine, Lyra, through a series of heart-stopping adventures into other worlds.

programme.title: A Choral Pilgrimage with The Sixteen
programme.desc: Luminous choral music on the theme of peace, performed by one of the worlds finest choirs and recorded at Peterborough Cathedral. A hymn to tranquillity, the concert features music from across nine centuries, from the medieval abbess Hildegard of Bingen to Anna Clyne with a new work for choir and violin. There are also sumptuous works by John Taverner, Will Todd and Arvo Part in his 90th birthday year. The Sixteen is led by conductor Harry Christophers. Presented by Hannah French.

programme.title: Jane Goodall: Beauty and the Beasts
programme.desc: Documentary about Jane Goodall, a young secretary from Bournemouth with no scientific qualifications, who entered a remote forest in Africa in 1960 and became accepted by a group of wild chimpanzees. Her discoveries transformed our understanding of them and challenged the way we define ourselves as human beings by showing just how close we are as a species to our closest living relatives.

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.desc: Join us for the peaceful and spiritually uplifting Isha prayers from the Belfast Islamic Centre, which serves as a hub for Muslims across Northern Ireland. The prayers are the final of the five daily prayers in Islam, which take place after sunset, providing an opportunity for worshippers to reflect on their day and look ahead to the future.

programme.title: Celebration Kitchen

programme.title: Joe Swash: Forgotten Young Dads
programme.desc: Too often overlooked in research and marginalised in society, many young dads across the UK are quietly rewriting the rulebook on fatherhood. In this revealing documentary, Joe Swash, who became a first-time father in his mid-twenties, meets four young men navigating the challenges of parenting. From stigma and financial strain to isolation and emotional growth, this is the rarely seen lived experience of men in their teens and twenties entering into fatherhood.

programme.desc: Many people regard France as the home of gastronomy and Lyon the culinary capital of France so thats where the journey begins as Dave and Si explore the bouchon -a restaurant traditionally run by a female chef or `mere Lyonnaise.

programme.title: Kelvins Big Farming Adventure
programme.desc: Pigs are next on the shopping list for Kelvins growing farm, but while hes away pursuing his other passion - motor racing - its his wife, Liz, who must bring home the bacon.

programme.title: This Farming Life
programme.desc: The Rodgers face a final TB test. Animals arrive at Lynn and Sandras croft. Raymond is kept guessing by his surrogate sheep and a calving boom starts at Kirsty and Aimees farm.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: The heroics and tragedies of the Allied invasion of Normandy, from the tense wait for the weather to break before the huge armada could set sail, to the bloody battles fought on the beaches of France.

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: A retrospective look at television appearances made over the years by Hollywood legend John Wayne, capturing the milestones and highlights of his life and career.

programme.title: Attenboroughs Wonder of Song
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough chooses his favourite recordings from the natural world that have revolutionised understanding of song. Each one, from the song of the largest lemur to the song of the humpback whale to the song of the lyrebird, was recorded in his lifetime.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin presents from Norwich cathedral in Norfolk, once home to Benedictine monks. Experts Thomas Plant and Kate Bateman pick out some gems to take to auction. Among them are a religious relic from France and a Martin brothers vase. Presenter Paul Martin visits the circus.

programme.title: What They Really Mean For You
programme.desc: Holidays abroad are an essential part of life for many of us. Cheap flights have helped millions of us travel to the sun. But the planes we fly on emit huge amounts of greenhouse gases, so the aviation industry is developing new ideas to reduce emissions with technologies such as new fuels and battery-powered planes.

programme.title: Eva Longoria: Searching for Spain
programme.sub-title: San Sebastian and the Basque Country
programme.desc: Eva Longoria travels to the Basque Country where San Sebastians imaginative cuisine reflects a proud cultural heritage and culinary mastery.

programme.title: Pilgrimage
programme.sub-title: The Road to the Scottish Isles
programme.desc: Seven celebrities tackle a modern-day pilgrimage which promotes tolerance for all culture.

programme.title: Rob Brydons Honky Tonk Road Trip
programme.desc: Rob explores the rich, often-overlooked influence of black musicians on the history of country music during the genres 100th anniversary year.

programme.title: Later ... with Jools Holland
programme.desc: With legends Suede, London singer Yazmin Lacey, country superstar Luke Combs, Mississippis Annie and the Caldwells, and Dublin band Sprints, as well as a chat with Gary Kemp.

programme.title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
programme.desc: Called back from retirement, veteran British spy George Smiley tries to ferret out a mole in MI6, who has been feeding vital information to the Soviets.

programme.title: The Awakening
programme.desc: In post-World War I England, a writer and sometime ghost-hunter investigates a reported haunting at a boys boarding school.

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents an hour of topical debate.

programme.title: Murder Case
programme.sub-title: The Hunt for Mary McLaughlins Killer
programme.desc: Detectives take on a decades-long mystery when they reinvestigate the 1984 murder of Mary Mclaughlin. A new suspect comes to the fore, but it raises more questions than answers.

programme.desc: Its the start of a new school year and the school is buzzing as borders find out who they are sharing a dorm with, and day pupils reunite at the lockers. Day One and no time is wasted as the students go head-to-head for roles in the new show: Anything Goes. And this year could be life changing for dancer Jakob as he starts his preparations for one of the worlds most prestigious international ballet competitions.

programme.title: Cooking Buddies
programme.desc: Buddy and Sienna make pizzas and score with their skills in the kitchen and on the pitch!

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Lily gets a part-time job waitressing at Mugshotsz Cafe, determined to prove to straight-talking owner Lou that teenagers make good workers. However, her mission goes wrong when Jas gets a job at the cafe too. Jas is messy and thoughtless, which upends Lilys need for perfection, yet Lou thinks Jas is brilliant. Meanwhile, Sid has been invited to audition for a performing arts college.

programme.title: Danny and Mick
programme.desc: The leisure centre is hosting a roller disco later that afternoon and Joy tells Danny and Mick if they want to be at the disco they need to finish every job on her list first. Danny spots a way to get some skating practise in and finish the jobs in double quick time, by doing all their work on wheels! Unfortunately, when a runaway Danny crashes through the disco it looks like the whole thing might be off.

programme.title: Danny and Mick
programme.desc: The centre needs to be decorated for a wedding later today, but Dannys more interested in his new invention, which unfortunately blows through every toilet roll in the centre. When Mick distracts him mid-order, he accidentally requests 10,000 toilet rolls instead of 100 by express delivery, and they arrive in a whole mountain of boxes. Fearing Joys reaction, the boys decide to hide the loo rolls.

programme.title: Bros in Control
programme.desc: Big Bros Adam and Kenny fight to prove who the ultimate bro is, in a series of wild games created by their little brothers Wisdom and Callum. To win is to be the very best, and to lose means shame and pain from the forfeit wheel of doom! This week, Kenny and Adam are forced to take on the role of parents to a big bowl of green slime.

programme.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The National Health Service is turning 75. Dr Xand discovers a time machine inside the cupboard of everything and embarks upon a journey through time with Mr Grumbles. He finds out what life was like before the NHS, and how its arrival changed the health of people all over the UK. Dr Chris catches up with Ouchers to hear their NHS stories, and Dr Ronx is on a mission to award Ouch Hero medals to thank incredible hospital staff for their service.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing hide and seek but they cant find Happy. Duggee can though: he follows Happys footprints. The Squirrels follow lots of different footprints that take them to their friend, but there is one set they just cant work out.

programme.title: Go Jetters

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how beavers play an important role in the environment. They find out that they are amazing eco-engineers who create watery habitats by building dams from trees they chop down. They learn that the pools and ponds the beavers make can support many different plants and animals too. On the way, they spot a beaver who has just woken up to start its nights work.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild

programme.title: Vida the Vet

Then, theres a healthy eating quiz based on the food groups that make up a balanced diet. programme.desc: Satyakant is an upright man of principles who banishes his son Surya after the boy makes some bad choices. Surya is taken under the wing of the transport king Big Boss.

programme.title: Saajan Bina Suhagan
programme.desc: Asha is in love with Raj Kumar, an aspiring doctor, and hopes one day to marry him. However, when he moves abroad to study Ashas father, on his death-bed, makes her promise to marry another man.

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: Set in a vicious and violent environment, Raj and Meera deal with the conflict between their respective families and the repercussions of the merciless violence between them.

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Rajkumar, an aimless youth, works for a drug baron and is sent to kill a rival dealer. His life is changed forever when he meets Chanda, and has no idea she is the adopted daughter of the man he is supposed to kill.

programme.title: Student of the Year 2
programme.desc: A man follows his lover to St Teresas college hoping to reunite with her. There, he befriends the most popular student who is constantly in disagreement with his sister.

programme.title: Romeo Akbar Walter
programme.desc: A bank cashier, Romeo, is recruited by Indias intelligence agency for espionage in Pakistan. However, he finds himself in challenging situations when his cover gets blown.

programme.title: Dil
programme.desc: A man pretends to be a rich industrialist to improve his sons chances of marrying into wealth, but his plan backfires on him.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Butt-Head blows off Beaviss ear and tries to reattach it. Beavis and Butt-Head think Beavis has died and is now a ghost.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Brad and Barney kickstart this leg of their tour with a bang - in honour of the famous Swede, Alfred Nobel. They then hit the ice and go head to head in a curling competition alongside the Swedish Womens Team in Stockholm. Barney treats his dad to an infamous fishy delicacy for breakfast, then takes him paintballing - with a Western twist! Before leaving the country, Barney treats ABBA mega fan Brad to the ultimate musical surprise.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: In the final leg of Brad and Barneys epic journey, the pair experience a bitterly cold Norway. The boys head to Lillehammer and try out the Olympic bobsleigh track before heading further north to the Arctic Circle and the worlds most northerly surfing location.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Eddie Moves In
programme.desc: With Joey in his new apartment, Chandler gets a troublesome new flatmate, Eddie. Meanwhile, Phoebe makes a video for `Smelly Cat, and Ross and Monica find it nearly impossible to live together.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Dr Ramoray Dies
programme.desc: Joeys remarks to a fan magazine could cause him to lose his job playing Dr Ramoray on a daytime television drama, and Chandlers new flatmate Eddie becomes too annoying to cope with.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Eddie Wont Go
programme.desc: Chandler wants his annoying new roommate to move out, Joey is forced to face some exorbitant bills, and the girls learn from a book about personal empowerment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Old Yeller Dies
programme.desc: Monicas new boyfriend impresses Chandler and Joey, Phoebe finds out what she missed as a child, and Rachel resents the fact that Ross is planning the rest of their lives together.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica is broke and decides to gamble on the stock market, and Chandler and Ross run into a couple of bullies in Central Park. Meanwhile, Rachel and Joey help Phoebe locate her father, but a vicious dog prevents Phoebe from finally meeting him. After accidentally injuring the dog with her car, Phoebe gets to know her fathers second wife whom she never knew about, and another long-lost family member.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica decides to hold a surprise birthday for Rachel, but everything goes wrong when Rachels estranged parents turn up unexpectedly. The party then splits into two factions: a dreary gathering in Monicas apartment, and a college-style drunken party at Chandler and Joeys flat.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Chicken Pox
programme.desc: Phoebes submariner boyfriend visits New York on leave from the Navy. Unfortunately, Phoebe catches chicken pox at baby Bens first birthday party. Meanwhile, when Monica realises that Richard has no real neuroses, she worries that she is too strange for him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Barry and Mindys Wedding
programme.desc: When Rachel serves as a bridesmaid at the wedding of her ex-fiance Barry and her friend Mindy, she relives the nightmare of her own failed wedding day. Meanwhile, Chandler becomes enamoured with a woman he meets on the internet, but is surprised when he finally meets her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Princess Leia Fantasy
programme.desc: Monica is distraught after her break-up with Richard. Phoebe unsuccessfully tries to raise her spirits, but ultimately its Mr Geller who comforts his daughter. Elsewhere, Chandler and Janice begin seeing each other again and Joey cant stand it. The two plan a day of fun to try to overcome Joeys aversions for Chandlers sake. Meanwhile, Rachel tells Phoebe and Monica about Rosss Princess Leia fantasy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where No Ones Ready
programme.desc: In a race against the clock, Ross tries to get the gang dressed and ready for a black-tie benefit at the museum.

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: A cartoon rabbit, framed for a murder he did not commit, teams up with a down-and-out private eye to clear his name. This Oscar-winning combination of live action and animation is set in a mythical 1940s Hollywood where humans and cartoon characters exist side by side.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica decides the best way to get over Richard is to keep herself busy. She develops a `jam plan, hoping the distraction of cooking will divert her attention. After making jars and jars of jam Monica decides she still wants to have a baby, so she begins searching for a sperm donor, and comes across Joeys file. Elsewhere, Phoebe is mistakenly stalked by a man who thinks shes Ursula, and Chandler receives dating advice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Metaphorical Tunnel
programme.desc: Ross panics when he sees his son with a Barbie doll, and Chandlers fear of commitment surfaces in his relationship with Janice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes attempts to introduce her visiting half brother Frank Jr to the delights of city life leave him thinking that she works in a brothel. Meanwhile, Ross lists five famous women that he would like to date. To his surprise, actress Isabella Rossellini, one of the women he rejected while narrowing down his list, pops in to Central Perk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When Janice asks whether any of the friends have ever dated one another the gang has a flashback to three years ago (one year before the pilot was supposed to have happened) when everyones lives were beginning to come together. Phoebe moves out of Monicas apartment, Chandler searches for a new roommate - ending up with Joey, Monica bumps into Rachel, and Ross learns that Carol is a lesbian.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Race Car Bed
programme.desc: When Monica buys a new bed from the Mattress King, the wrong one is delivered. Meanwhile, Joey sees Janice kissing her husband, and Rachels father clashes with Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Giant Poking Device
programme.desc: Chandler and Janice reach a turning point in their relationship, while Monica accidentally injures Ben and tries to hide it from Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, the friends form teams and play American football. Ross and Monica relive their sibling rivalry by going head-to-head as opposing team captains. Rachel is upset that Ross didnt choose her for his team, and Joey tries to outwit his foe Chandler. Meanwhile, the turkey is left stewing while the losing team calls for a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
programme.desc: Ross is suspicious about Rachels possible job offer from a good-looking stranger, while Chandler cant remember which of Joeys many attractive sisters he kissed at a party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Jealousy
programme.desc: Ross becomes increasingly jealous of Rachels sexy new colleague, Mark, and gets the wrong end of the stick when he spies on Rachel at her office. Meanwhile, Monica is enamoured with a sexy busboy who writes love poems for her, and Joey gets himself into trouble by faking his CV in order to get a part in a Broadway musical.

programme.title: 9 to 5
programme.desc: Office satire about three female secretaries who decide to get revenge on their tyrannical, sexist boss by abducting him and running the business themselves. The trio, one of whom has been passed over for promotion because she is a woman, spend a night together having drug-induced fantasies of killing the slave-driving chauvinist. One of them panics the following day when she suspects she really has poisoned the tyrant.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Maisie Adam, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Vogue Williams
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Maisie Adam, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Vogue Williams to rip into embarrassing TikToks, confusing challenges and painfully awkward posts. (S1, E07)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr once again oversees the disputes and deliberations on the topical events that set the nations chins wagging as Jon and Sean are joined by guests Hannibal Buress, Sam Buttery, Stephen Mangan and Katherine Ryan.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: In Dating App, singleton Greg chooses between Waynes butt detective, Colins obsessive alien and Ryans trashy fairy godmother. Guest Chris Lee joins.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: News anchor Colin is hassled by Jonathans male stripper in Weird Newscasters. Beatboxer Kaila Mullady joins Wayne and Jonathan in a song about toilet paper during the pandemic.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie, along with guest performer Jeff Davis, put their comedic skills to the test through a series of spontaneous improv games based on random ideas from the studio audience.

programme.title: Important Things With Demetri Martin
programme.desc: Part stream-of-consciousness sketch show, part stand up comedy, mixed with animation and music.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of four elementary school boys.

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show
programme.desc: Karl addresses one of his pet peeves: animals that are treated like people. Later he issues a public safety announcement for chameleons and considers the question `Does the brain control you or do you control the brain? Plus, Stephen finds out from Karls diary why we should do away with birthday presents altogether.

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show
programme.desc: Karl reveals that he often goes on walks to observe ants, moths and other insects and that once, he saw a bee have a heart attack. Also, Stephen asks Karl a question posed to guests on American TV series `Inside the Actors Studio.

Phoebe moves out of Monicas apartment, Chandler searches for a new roommate - ending up with Joey, Monica bumps into Rachel, and Ross learns that Carol is a lesbian.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Race Car Bed
programme.desc: When Monica buys a new bed from the Mattress King, the wrong one is delivered. Meanwhile, Joey sees Janice kissing her husband, and Rachels father clashes with Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Giant Poking Device
programme.desc: Chandler and Janice reach a turning point in their relationship, while Monica accidentally injures Ben and tries to hide it from Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, the friends form teams and play American football. Ross and Monica relive their sibling rivalry by going head-to-head as opposing team captains. Rachel is upset that Ross didnt choose her for his team, and Joey tries to outwit his foe Chandler. Meanwhile, the turkey is left stewing while the losing team calls for a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
programme.desc: Ross is suspicious about Rachels possible job offer from a good-looking stranger, while Chandler cant remember which of Joeys many attractive sisters he kissed at a party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Jealousy
programme.desc: Ross becomes increasingly jealous of Rachels sexy new colleague, Mark, and gets the wrong end of the stick when he spies on Rachel at her office. Meanwhile, Monica is enamoured with a sexy busboy who writes love poems for her, and Joey gets himself into trouble by faking his CV in order to get a part in a Broadway musical.

programme.title: 9 to 5
programme.desc: Office satire about three female secretaries who decide to get revenge on their tyrannical, sexist boss by abducting him and running the business themselves. The trio, one of whom has been passed over for promotion because she is a woman, spend a night together having drug-induced fantasies of killing the slave-driving chauvinist. One of them panics the following day when she suspects she really has poisoned the tyrant.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Maisie Adam, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Vogue Williams
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Maisie Adam, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Vogue Williams to rip into embarrassing TikToks, confusing challenges and painfully awkward posts. (S1, E07)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr once again oversees the disputes and deliberations on the topical events that set the nations chins wagging as Jon and Sean are joined by guests Hannibal Buress, Sam Buttery, Stephen Mangan and Katherine Ryan.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: In Dating App, singleton Greg chooses between Waynes butt detective, Colins obsessive alien and Ryans trashy fairy godmother. Guest Chris Lee joins.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: News anchor Colin is hassled by Jonathans male stripper in Weird Newscasters. Beatboxer Kaila Mullady joins Wayne and Jonathan in a song about toilet paper during the pandemic.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie, along with guest performer Jeff Davis, put their comedic skills to the test through a series of spontaneous improv games based on random ideas from the studio audience.

programme.title: Important Things With Demetri Martin
programme.desc: Part stream-of-consciousness sketch show, part stand up comedy, mixed with animation and music.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of four elementary school boys.

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show
programme.desc: Karl addresses one of his pet peeves: animals that are treated like people. Later he issues a public safety announcement for chameleons and considers the question `Does the brain control you or do you control the brain? Plus, Stephen finds out from Karls diary why we should do away with birthday presents altogether.

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show
programme.desc: Karl reveals that he often goes on walks to observe ants, moths and other insects and that once, he saw a bee have a heart attack. Also, Stephen asks Karl a question posed to guests on American TV series `Inside the Actors Studio.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Jamies Great Britain
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver travels Britain to find out what makes our food great. Hes searching for new ideas and inspiration to create his own versions of British classics. He kicks off his road-trip close to home in the East End, uncovering his familys roots in the area and tasting classic pie and mash and modern Vietnamese street food, as well as meeting a chef turning humble burgers into gourmet cuisine.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by top TV chef Monica Galetti. Theyre in Oxford, where Monica discovers the delights of an organic local distiller. James takes a river trip to a fantastic pick your own farm where he picks some raspberries and he uses them to cook a delicious pudding on the banks of the river. James also visits one of the worlds best chefs, Raymond Blanc, at his restaurant Le Manoir aux QuatSaisons, where he enjoys some of Raymonds Michelin-starred dishes.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is in South Wales, accompanied by Michelin-starred chef Stephen Terry. James discovers award-winning Welsh wine and cooks a Welsh lamb ragu on a beautiful mountainside. He samples the delights of organic Welsh chocolate and visits cooking legend Shaun Hill at his renowned restaurant The Walnut Tree. The day comes to an end at Barry Island, where James and Stephen enjoy all the fairground rides at this famous resort and James cooks Barry Island churros overlooking the beach.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: `The Great British Bake Off makes its debut on Channel 4 as the series returns for an eighth season with 12 budding bakers competing to be crowned the champion. Established judge Paul Hollywood is joined by food connoisseur Prue Leith, while seasoned entertainers Sandi Toksvig and Noel Fielding take on the role of being the shows hosts. Despite the change in personnel, the key Bake Off traditions remain intact, as the contestants try to impress the panel with a fine selection of beautifully-crafted and delicious cakes, tarts, breads and more.

programme.title: Amy
programme.desc: Filmmaker Asif Kapadia examines the life and career of singer/songwriter Amy Winehouse, who died of alcohol poisoning in 2011.

programme.title: Arts Most

programme.title: Lou Reed - Transformer (Classic Album)
programme.desc: Transformer is considered to be one of the best albums of the 1970s. This documentary examines it with Lou Reed and engineer Ken Scott talking about Perfect Day and Vicious among others; Herbie Flowers shows how the base line on Walk on the Wild Side was recorded and Dave Stewart talks of Lous influence on him.

programme.title: Discovering Music
programme.desc: From Crazy Horse to Crosby, Stills, Nash and Young, Neil Young was a driving force behind some of the biggest groups of the 60s before finding huge success on his own.

programme.title: Discovering Music

programme.title: Sing When You Are Winning: How Football Fans Became an Opera Chorus
programme.desc: Follow the search led by Nicky Spence and Kwame Kwei-Armah to find singers from a motely crew of fans to form part of the football chorus.

programme.title: Gods of the Game
programme.desc: Including a trained football fan chorus to mark the World Cup, this operatic tale of corruption that shrouds the beautiful game at presents combines well-known arias and musical pieces.

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Competition is fierce as local merchant Robert and wife Kelly open up a fish and chip restaurant. Plus, follow the journey of the turbot as it goes from sea to the dinner plate.

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Carlton Towers hosts a British culinary weekend for eager tourists, while a group of budding wine connoisseurs arrive at Chillingham Castle for a tasting weekend.

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: The majestic Muncaster Castle takes centre stage in this penultimate instalment as the Pennington family discuss the struggles of keeping a stately home afloat.

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: A group of no-nonsense shooting enthusiasts see how the other half lives when they join a pheasant shoot at Chillingham Castle in Northumberland.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Nine noble families in the seven kingdoms of Westeros vie for control of the Iron Throne. Meanwhile, a long forgotten race of ancient mythical creatures return to wreak havoc.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Starks of Winterfell host the visit of the royal family. Across the sea, the exiled Targaryen prince plots an alliance to regain at last the Iron Throne.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: An altercation between the Stark and Baratheon children threatens to drive a wedge between the two noble houses.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Lord Ned Stark arrives at Kings Landing, and before he can shake off the dust of the road, his presence is requested by the Small Council. On his way through the Red Keep, Ned sees Sir Jaime Lannister standing by the Iron Throne. The two men exchange barbs, and then Jaime recounts the day that the Mad King Aerys murdered Neds father and brother in the throne room.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: A raven flies through the gates of Winterfell, swooping past Bran Stark, whos standing in the courtyard practising his archery. He walks after the bird, and when he catches up to it, sees that the raven has three eyes. Bran wakens from the dream and finds himself in bed with his wolf Summer, still unable to walk. Theon Greyjoy enters the room with Hodor, a large and simpleminded stable boy, who carries Bran downstairs.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Silent Sisters perform rites over Ser Hugh of the Vales corpse and stitch up the throat wound that killed the young knight. Lord Ned Stark and Ser Barristan Selmy look on, discussing how Ser Hugh recently was raised to knighthood and received enough money to buy some fine new armour. Ned is also suspicious of how the knight came to be matched up against Ser Gregor Clegane, known as The Mountain, in the tourney.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ned deals with all sorts of new issues while King Robert goes hunting, and Tyrion must stand trial at the Eyrie for his alleged crimes.

programme.title: True Detective
programme.desc: Wayne and Roland chase new leads as Amelia attempts to uncover the whereabouts of the mysterious one-eyed man.

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: After a series of raids, Stringer Bell hands down new rules to the drug crew and plans a new strategy to keep his boss away from the limelight. The polices lack of success is starting to bring them pressures.

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul and Gina reach a crossroad in their relationship.

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: Joel and Ellie, a pair connected through the harshness of the world they live in, are forced to endure brutal circumstances and ruthless killers on a trek across a post-outbreak America.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: The saga of a fictional, American global-media family that is not only rich and powerful but also powerfully dysfunctional.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Hounds of War
programme.desc: A mercenary seeks revenge after his entire team gets wiped out during a final mission.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released aboard an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity, and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater threat. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to recruit a team to stand against this newly-awakened enemy. Despite the formation of an unprecedented league of heroes in Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash, it may be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a time before the pyramids, an evil king threatens to take over the world, so the leaders of the remaining tribes under threat call upon a desert warrior to help them defeat the wicked one and his brutal hordes. As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King.

programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still Johns constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, Johns girlfriend. Though Loris displeasure is exacerbated by the pairs constant consumption of beer and weed, shes not the one whos most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of Johns boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Estate
programme.desc: Two sisters try to win over their terminally ill, difficult-to-please aunt in hopes of becoming the beneficiaries of her wealthy estate, only to find the rest of their greedy family has the same idea.

programme.title: The Kings Speech
programme.desc: Afflicted with a stammer, Prince Albert, the Duke of York, dreads the speaking engagements that come with being the son of King George V.

programme.title: Sundown
programme.desc: A wealthy man is vacationing with loved ones at a resort in Acapulco, Mexico until he receives a phone call. Theres been a death in the family, and everyone must return home. However, the man pretends to lose his passport, which delays his return.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: ...And Justice for All
programme.desc: Satirical drama in which an idealistic lawyer who tries to win cases for clients trapped in a hypocritical and corrupt legal system finds himself defending a venal and self-righteous judge accused of rape. The judge wrongly assumes the lawyers ideals and disdain for the courts will drive him to get an acquittal, despite the evidence and the loathing they have for each other.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Effects-laden blockbuster about a huge reptile which emerges from the sea to wreak havoc in Manhattan. On a research trip to Chernobyl, a young scientist discovers a startling link between genetic mutation and radioactivity. When a fishing trawler is attacked by an unseen creature, and other evidence of a massive reptilian creature is unearthed, he realises that the creature is following a destructive path to New York.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: Following the death of a local diver, a New York palaeontologist is sent out to help the local fisheries warden investigate the case.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: ...And Justice for All
programme.desc: Satirical drama in which an idealistic lawyer who tries to win cases for clients trapped in a hypocritical and corrupt legal system finds himself defending a venal and self-righteous judge accused of rape. The judge wrongly assumes the lawyers ideals and disdain for the courts will drive him to get an acquittal, despite the evidence and the loathing they have for each other.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Effects-laden blockbuster about a huge reptile which emerges from the sea to wreak havoc in Manhattan. On a research trip to Chernobyl, a young scientist discovers a startling link between genetic mutation and radioactivity. When a fishing trawler is attacked by an unseen creature, and other evidence of a massive reptilian creature is unearthed, he realises that the creature is following a destructive path to New York.

programme.title: Lake Placid

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter cant seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owners payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father only to discover his shallow grave is now empty, forcing them to question one anothers loyalty with devastating consequences as fear and paranoia set in.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: An amnesiac called Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporations locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: Vacation turns disaster when Kyle and her friends escape a plane crash in the desolate Louisiana everglades, only to discover theres something more dangerous lurking in the shallows.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.sub-title: The Story of the House of Leaves

programme.sub-title: The Story of Gertie the Goat

Will Gertie and Bao Bao prove the others wrong, or will they need some help from their friends?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane

Alan is delighted when his very own scooter eventually arrives.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
